vimeoVideo.title: Vimeo Video
vimeoVideo.confirmationText: By accessing the video, you agree that your data will be transmitted to Vimeo and that you have read the {0}.
vimeoVideo.privacyPolicyContent: When you access videos from Vimeo, your data may be transmitted to Vimeo Inc. This may include your IP address, device information, and viewing behavior. Vimeo processes this data according to their privacy policy. By continuing, you consent to this data transmission.
